WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is a Silverlight compatibility issue with FireFox 3.6 and the issue is posted on their site. This is not a Rawr issue
WorkItem.Description:
When Rawr is in a browser with multiple tabs, I'm unable to click on anything.
 
reproduce this:
1. Open the app in Firefox, this can be done before or after step 2.
2. Open another tab in Firefox.
3. Observe that buttons no longer appear to be "clickable" and a bleed effect is present while scrolling the page, causing elements from other open tabs to blend with the display of the app.
 
other notes:
running Windows 7
Firefox 3.6.3
